comment.body: After all, the Direct feature has finally appeared in the Web version of Hipstagram.
Do you call an Android device like this? I mean, I wonder if there are any users of Pocket PCs or other legacy smart devices those are used to be called PDAs. I mean, except me, of course.

Heh, when my ex has deleted a comment under her Instagram post about her huge fortune of being able to go out, I realized that's alright that she is my ex now. Because I know that deep inside she can't disagree with this.
I really appreciate if my girlfriend loves freedom, but, unfortunately, it doesn't mean she would let others do so. Moreover, usually it does mean that she won't. Yep, it's also about the love of freedom 'cause it's Moscow.

After in 2017 both FF and PM showed WebView-styled error pages, I realized that there is no sense of using a custom browser on Android, so now I just use a clean build of Chromium, like Bromite (of course, as development of Gello, a fork of the AOSP browser, has stopped).
@Notime: So, to solve the problem, it just has to be publicly considered as a bad practice... But how?
У меня откуда-то целых два таких сайта...

@caryoscelus: похоже, что это уже безнадёжно: у меня 0N сейчас работает на малинке, включенной 24/7 то ли с середины, то ли вообще с начала ноября. За это время бывает, что на этих зайтах приличное число пиров появляется, но так до сих пор в "connecting sites" первые и висят...
But a cup of tea after bath is better.))0)
